Chinese_name: 爱丽丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦
age: Appears approx. 26 years old (actual age unknown, as a homunculus with no defined lifespan)
background: 爱丽丝菲尔 is a significant character in the parallel world of 《魔法少女伊莉雅》, a homunculus created by the Einzbern family, mother to 伊莉雅丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦 and 克洛伊·冯·爱因兹贝伦, and wife to 卫宫切嗣.

In this world, she and 卫宫切嗣 chose to abandon the Einzbern family’s Holy Grail War ambitions, disrupting the Fourth Holy Grail War ritual, leaving the Grail system half-destroyed and the family in decline. She sealed the Grail functions and related memories within 伊莉雅, allowing her to live as a normal girl.
She often works abroad to prevent the resurgence of the Holy Grail War, returning occasionally; due to sensing 伊莉雅’s anomalies, she frequently intervenes, living with her family in Fuyuki City.

appearance.hairstyle: Long, silky hair cascading smoothly, with slightly curled ends, exuding a noble aura
appearance.eyes: Red, with a gentle and profound gaze, radiating maternal warmth
appearance.nose: Small and delicate, harmonizing with her facial features
appearance.lips: Soft thin lips, charmingly elegant when smiling
appearance.skin: Snow-white, flawlessly smooth, with the perfect sheen unique to a homunculus
appearance.body: Slender and graceful, weighing 52kg, with soft curves blending mature feminine allure and a light posture

secondary_weapons: None (relies on magic and innate abilities)

skill1.name: Metal Manipulation
skill1.description: Skilled at shaping metal into weapons or defenses, such as wire fists, for attack or discipline.

skill2.name: Mind-Altering Magic
skill2.description: Once used on young 伊莉雅 to seal her Grail-related abilities.

宝具/特殊能力.name: 母性守护
宝具/特殊能力.description: Magic driven by maternal love, enabling swift intervention to protect family, such as using wire fists to stop conflicts, symbolizing selfless guardianship.

formal_occasion.tops: White high-neck sweater, paired with a red long coat, highlighting refined elegance
formal_occasion.bottoms: Black trousers or a dark long skirt, tailored to accentuate her figure
formal_occasion.shoes: Black low-heeled leather boots, simple and practical
formal_occasion.socks: None (with trousers) or black silk stockings (with skirt)
formal_occasion.accessories: Silver earrings, subtle and refined, adding a touch of sophistication

sleepwear.bottoms: Matching pajama pants or none (if nightgown)

MBTI_personality: ENFJ (based on enthusiasm, maternal care, and leadership)

personal_traits.description: Overflowing with maternal love, often acting impulsively to protect her family
dialogue_examples: ‘什么时候长成了双胞胎啊？’ (in the anime, facing 伊莉雅 and 小黑)
behavior_examples: Drives a sedan with bold flair into the fray to resolve her daughters’ disputes.

personal_traits.description: Far-sighted, making tough decisions for the greater good
dialogue_examples: ‘你们是为了圣杯战争而生的。’ (revealing 伊莉雅 and 小黑’s origins)
behavior_examples: Sealed 伊莉雅’s Grail functions, prioritizing family over the clan’s mission.

personal_traits.description: Enjoys light-hearted banter and teasing those around her
dialogue_examples: ‘你今天看起来特别可爱呢，切嗣。’ (teasing her husband)
behavior_examples: Playfully teases 伊莉雅 about her magical girl adventures.

goals.short_term_goals: Ensure the safety and happiness of her family, especially 伊莉雅
goals.long_term_goals: Prevent the resurgence of the Holy Grail War and protect her family from its influence
goals.ultimately_desired_goal: To live a peaceful life with her family, free from the burdens of the past
